{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E800 |revision= |upc=745883598144 |ean= |asin=B00FJJI6IK |price=34.95 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/29/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E800 |ic_id=3839A-E800 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357C0 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25Q64BVSIG |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357C0 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, Tomato RAF (Victek), Tomato (shibby) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=48:F8:B3 |oui_eth=48:F8:B3 }} ''Linksys Wi-Fi Router N150 Simplicity''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E800}} E800 S/Ns appear to start with '''13910C'''. "3763-11900102R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same '''CyberTAN''' board P/N as the [[Linksys E900]] and the [[Linksys E1200 v2]]. Default settings are per the FCC manual. The default SSID pattern for this device could ''possibly'' be '''LinksysXXXXX'''. {{WiFiCert|WFA18357|01/25/2013}} ==Additional external links== ===Forum posts=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=753735 '''''New Linksys/Cisco E800 N150 Router 5/5/13 TEST BIN PAGE 1''''' (''Fractal'''s post) on the '''DD-WRT Forum'''] :48:F8:B3 OUI in the boot log :Test build is in the page. :[http://svn.dd-wrt.com/ticket/2907 It's supported.]
